## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G06110](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G06110)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtGlsA1, AtGlsA2, ZRF1b</u>
- **Gene Name:** gonidialess A/Zuotin related factor A1, gonidialess A/Zuotin related factor A2, ZUOTIN-RELATED FACTOR 1b
- **Description:**   DnaJ and myb-like DNA-binding domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2152835
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
